items.headline: ‘I‘m facing an ethical dilemma’: My widowed mother is cutting my step siblings out of the family trust. Do I have a responsibility?
items.summary_en: “My mother has now hired an attorney to revise the trust and remove her late husband’s children as beneficiaries.”

items.headline: Deutsche Bank’s offices raided, reportedly over allegations tied to Roman Abramovich
items.summary_en: Germany’s federal criminal police office on Wednesday carried out a raid on the country’s largest bank, Deutsche Bank, reportedly on money-laundering allegations tied to Russian magnate Roman Abramovich.

items.headline: Starbucks rewards investors with another quarter of growth in a key sales metric

items.headline: Why this hedge-fund veteran says investors should own both high-flying gold and the sinking U.S. dollar
